posts.post_title: FS: 1887 Allen & Ginter Rifle Shooters, Annie Oakley
posts.post_content:
I just got back all of the Rifle shooters from SGC, Lower grade coming out of an Album, but with nice eye appeal.

They are listed on my page at [URL="https://www.gfg.com/baseball/oars.shtml#rifles"]Dave's Vintage Baseball Cards[/URL] and this link will take you there!

Check them out, and here are the pics, as I said they are listed on the site with pricing.
